about_the_game:
Have you ever wanted to relax and have a good smoke in an atmospheric village? Then you are exactly at the right place - take a drag on your cigarette and go ahead and explore our wonderful world. It doesn’t matter whether you are an esthete or an amateur, everyone will find a piece of happiness in the Smoking Simulator, only here you can smoke a lot without any negative consequences, or you can go explore the atmospheric village, looking at the works of art on the walls and nature, as your heart desires.

Key Features:
-You can smoke 24/7 without any penalties/negative consequences
-Relaxing soundtrack
-You can take a running jump into the snow from a hill without fear of crashing
-Atmosphere and humor
-Various references
-Beautiful next-gen graphics

All similarities with real people, countries, places, etc. are purely coincidental. The game takes place in a fictional country - Cigaretteland.

Enjoy!)

It doesn’t matter whether you are an esthete or an amateur, everyone will find a piece of happiness in the Smoking Simulator, only here you can smoke a lot without any negative consequences, or you can go explore the atmospheric village, looking at the works of art on the walls and nature, as your heart desires.

-You can take a running jump into the snow from a hill without fear of crashing

name: Smoking Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 or intel core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

short_description: Have you ever wanted to relax and have a good smoke in an atmospheric village? Then you are exactly at the right place - take a drag on your cigarette and go ahead and explore our wonderful world.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
